title: Novozymes, Chr. Hansen unveil name of future combined company - Aquafeed.com
summary: Novozymes and Chr. Hansen announced their merger to create Novonesis, a biosolutions group with a focus on biological sciences and technology to address global challenges. The merger is expected to be finalized in the first quarter of 2024, creating a global network with over 23 manufacturing sites and around 10,000 employees.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is considered green innovation as the merger aims to create a biosolutions group focusing on innovation in biological sciences and technology to address environmental and sustainability challenges.
business_innovation: TRUE. The merger between Novozymes and Chr. Hansen to create Novonesis is a business innovation as it involves the introduction of a new entity with significantly different products and processes.
green_product: FALSE. The article does not specifically mention individual green products in the context of the merger.
green_process: FALSE. While the merger may involve implementing green processes in the future, the article does not detail specific green processes related to the operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325998 - All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing, 541710 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences, 325412 - Pharmaceutical Preparation Manufacturing, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences (except Nanotechnology and Biotechnology)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not exhibit characteristics of greenwashing; instead, it focuses on the genuine intentions of the merger to tackle global challenges using biosolutions.

title: Lezlee Westine Reflects on Her Tenure as President & CEO of Personal Care Products Council - Happi
summary: Lezlee Westine is retiring as President and CEO of the Personal Care Products Council, to be replaced by Tom Myers effective January 1. Westine reflects on accomplishments during her tenure and emphasizes principles that guided her leadership. The Council's achievements include significant milestones like The Modernization of Cosmetics Regulation Act of 2022 and sustainability efforts promoting environmental stewardship and diversity in the beauty industry. PCPC has broadened its scope to focus on safety, transparency, innovation, and industry partnerships.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325620 Toiletry Product Manufacturing, 813920 Professional Organizations, 813110 Religious Organizations, 812112 Beauty Salons

title: BWH Hotels and Call2Recycle Bring Battery Recycling Practices to the Canadian Hospitality Sector - GlobeNewswire
summary: Call2Recycle and BWH Hotels collaborate to implement battery recycling across the BWH network, marking a significant step in Canadian hospitality sector sustainability. BWH's global "Because We Care" program includes battery recycling as part of its commitment to sustainability. Call2Recycle emphasizes the environmental and economic benefits of battery recycling and its impact on a strong circular economy.
green_innovation: TRUE. The collaboration between Call2Recycle and BWH Hotels to implement battery recycling on a large scale in the hospitality sector contributes to environmental sustainability goals and reduces negative environmental externalities.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article does not focus on new or improved products or business processes that significantly differ from the firm's previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE. The article discusses the implementation of battery recycling, which significantly reduces environmental impact throughout the life cycle of the batteries used in the hospitality industry.
green_process: TRUE. The article mentions the implementation of battery recycling processes, which aim to minimize environmental impacts, promote sustainability, and reduce harmful substances released into the environment.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 721110 (Hotels (except Casino Hotels) and Motels), 562920 (Materials Recovery Facilities), 562111 (Solid Waste Collection), 562119 (Other Waste Collection)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article highlights a genuine effort by BWH Hotels and Call2Recycle to implement battery recycling on a large scale as part of a sustainability strategy, without any indication of false or misleading environmental claims.

title: Best Agrolife acquires 99% stake in Kashmir Chemicals - Indian Chemical News
summary: Best Agrolife Ltd. (BAL) acquires a 99% stake in Kashmir Chemicals to enhance manufacturing capacity in response to growing market demand for agrochemical products. The partnership aims to contribute approximately Rs. 350 crores to BAL's returns and introduces an innovative herbicide composition.
product_or_process: Synergistic Granular Herbicidal Composition for Paddy
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325320 - Pesticide and Other Agricultural Chemical Manufacturing, 325411 - Medicinal and Botanical Manufacturing, 325414 - Biological Product (except Diagnostic) Manufacturing, 325998 - All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing
